server.world.locations

Class LocationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.world.locations.LocationController

  • public final class LocationController
extends java.lang.Object
    LocationController() returns all incoming responses from the instanced classes and then sets them in their respective static voids for the Python scripts to read when the player interacts within that regional class.
    Author:
    Dennis
